title: 5 Stages in Every Relationship and 3 Steps to Keeping the Spark Alive Long Term
description:
If you enjoy On Purpose, you’ll love Jay’s Genius workshops and meditations. Go to https://shetty.cc/OnPurposeGenius to learn more.

Are you ready to transform your relationship into one that is lasting and healthy? On this episode of On Purpose with Jay Shetty, Jay walks through the relationship “ladder” of how to build a healthy relationship.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
